incomeTaxes.name: Box 1 Income Tax (Employment and Housing)
incomeTaxes.notes: 2024 rates for Box 1 income (employment, business, primary residence). General tax credit up to €3,500 applies. Amount varies based on income.

incomeTaxes.name: Box 2 Income Tax (Substantial Business Interest)
incomeTaxes.notes: 2024 rate for income from substantial business interest (5% or more shares in a company)

incomeTaxes.name: Box 3 Income Tax (Savings and Investments)
incomeTaxes.notes: 2024 rate. Applies to net wealth from savings and investments. Tax-free allowance of €57,000 per person (€114,000 for fiscal partners)

wealthTaxes.name: Box 3 Wealth Tax
wealthTaxes.notes: 2024 rate. Integrated with Box 3 income tax system. Calculated based on deemed returns on assets.

capitalGainsTaxes.name: Capital Gains Tax
capitalGainsTaxes.notes: Netherlands does not have a separate capital gains tax. Capital gains are taxed through Box 2 (substantial business interest) or Box 3 (savings and investments) system.
